actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 43 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a handicapped person who maintains a household to be eligible for the earned income credit provided under such section.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the earned income tax credit to handicapped persons who maintain households, whether or not they have children residing there.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 43 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a handicapped person who maintains a household to be eligible for the earned income credit provided under such section.
